explains: n. [管理] 禁令；命令；劝告

sentences.en: The court granted an injunction against the defendants.
sentences.cn: 法庭对被告发出了禁制令。

sentences.en: They have obtained an injunction restraining the company from selling the product.
sentences.cn: 他们已经得到阻止这家公司出售这一产品的禁销令。

sentences.en: He took out a court injunction against the newspaper demanding the return of the document.
sentences.cn: 他拿出法院强制令，要求这家报纸归还该文件。
